title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with Emir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani of Qatar – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 15, 2018
President Donald J. Trump spoke yesterday with Emir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani of Qatar.  The leaders discussed ongoing cooperation between the United States and Qatar and the importance of Gulf unity to mitigate regional security threats and to ensure the region’s economic prosperity.
